languages.text: {n}Ядовитый смешок слетает с губ Маражая. Он с огромным интересом поглядывает то на вас, то на Калькасара.{/n}
{n}A venomous chuckle escapes Marazhai's lips. He is looking between you and Calcazar with great interest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ядовитый смешок слетает с губ Маражая. Он с огромным интересом поглядывает то на вас, то на Калькасара.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋唇角露出了充满恶毒的笑意，饶有兴趣地打量着你和卡尔卡扎。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A venomous chuckle escapes Marazhai's lips. He is looking between you and Calcazar with great interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋唇角露出了充满恶毒的笑意，饶有兴趣地打量着你和卡尔卡扎。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una risa venenosa escapa de los labios de Marazhai. Os mira a Calcazar y a ti con sumo interés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A venomous chuckle escapes Marazhai's lips. He is looking between you and Calcazar with great interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una risa venenosa escapa de los labios de Marazhai. Os mira a Calcazar y a ti con sumo interés.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの唇から毒々しい笑みが漏れる。彼は興味深げにあなたとカルカサルを見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A venomous chuckle escapes Marazhai's lips. He is looking between you and Calcazar with great interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの唇から毒々しい笑みが漏れる。彼は興味深げにあなたとカルカサルを見ている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un rire caustique s'échappe des lèvres de Marazhai. Son regard se pose tour à tour sur vous et Calcazar avec grand intérêt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A venomous chuckle escapes Marazhai's lips. He is looking between you and Calcazar with great interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rire caustique s'échappe des lèvres de Marazhai. Son regard se pose tour à tour sur vous et Calcazar avec grand intérêt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein giftiges Lachen entweicht Marazhais Lippen. Er blickt mit großem Interesse zwischen dir und Calcazar her.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A venomous chuckle escapes Marazhai's lips. He is looking between you and Calcazar with great interest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudaklarından haince bir kıkırtı çıkıyor. Merakla bir sana bir Calcazar'a bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A venomous chuckle escapes Marazhai's lips. He is looking between you and Calcazar with great interest.{/n}
